Text: Yes, unfortunately imagebam added the annoying "click here to continue to your image" links not too long ago.  Seriously, if you have any suggestions for a better image host, please let me know.  I need one that makes it easy to upload multiple images into a gallery that I can link to.

I did not get any redirects on Imagemam,clicked on the gallery link abobe and then clicked on the image  which opened just fine,no redirects.

Maybe because i'm using Adblock & Noscript with Firefox and Chrome.
The "continue to your image" link doesn't show up all the time.  I think it's only if it's the first time you've gone to imagebam since you opened your browser.
